name: Tasmanian Devil: Munching Madness
description:
Pack your bags and get ready for a fantastic trip around the world! Bull Gator and Axl have kidnapped Wendel T. Wolf and headed for Las Vegas! Can Taz get there in time to save Wendel from being sold to the circus?

  • Eat your way through 8 fantastic levels of fun, food and frolics!
  • Find Taz's friends and family to give you clues!
  • Battle crazy boses on every level!
  • Collect Chili Peppers for special red hot attacks!
